item.title: CodeStar
item.description: About AWS CodeStar enables you to quickly develop, build, and deploy applications on AWS. AWS CodeStar provides a unified user interface, enabling you to easily manage your software development activities in one place. Documentation User Guide CodeStar enables to quickly develop, build, & deploy applicÂ­ations on AWS. With AWS CodeStar, you can create, manage, and scale automated code reviews with a single click. You can also monitor the performance and scalability of your code review process with the built-in metrics dashboard.
